response.original_title: Our Precious Hope Revisited: St. Louis' Little Jane Doe
response.overview: As the 40th anniversary of the horrific discovery of a beheaded little girl in the basement of an abandoned building in St. Louis approaches, director Edrar "Bird" Sosa (Our Precious Hope: St. Louis' Little Jane Doe Revisited) re-examines the gruesome details of the near 40-year-old cold case.
response.title: Our Precious Hope Revisited: St. Louis' Little Jane Doe
